scripts.dev: cp ./index.html dist/index.html && cp -r public/* dist/ && node esbuild.dev.config0.mjs
scripts.predeployx: npm run build && cp ./index.html build/index.html && cp -r public/* build/
scripts.predeploy: node esbuild.prod.config1.mjs && cp ./index.html build/index.html && cp -r public/* build/
